ValidationRule.description: If the CPA Indicator Field is Paid in Full value the CPA Funds paid should always be less than or equal to the Total Copay
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator Full', ISPICKVAL(CPA_Indicator__c, "Opt-in - Paid in full"), CPA_Funds_Paid__c > Total_Copay__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This value cannot exceed the "Total Copay" Amount
